message: Let's be fair, I'll take a bit more
Let's split it evenly this time.  We both get a fair share, and we don't have to worry about the inflation hurting us.
I'll take a bit more to compensate for inflation
I'm willing to give you a little more this time to account for inflation, but we need to reach a compromise soon or we'll both lose out.
Time's running out, let's settle on this
This is my final offer. We're losing money with each round, and we need to make a deal now.  I'm willing to give you a good share, but I need to ensure I get enough to make it worth my while.
